page.title: 05FARMING IN LAMBLEY.
page.content: { {COTTAGE FARM}is owned by N.S. Foster & nephew Chris.Situated down Catfoot la- ne near Lambley.Covers 350 acres 50% owned 50% rented 30-40 fields.Medium sized farm.Farm started in 1882 & was a market garden farm.Employes 1 labou- rer who works 45 hours aweek.Farmer on call 24 hours.Belongs to farmers co-op erative.Sells cereals to 1 firm.Grows barley for beer & animals.Wheat for bread,biscuits & animal feed.Oil seed rape for margarine.75 Pedigree South Devon cows bred for beef not milk.We tried to touch the cows but they moved away in fright.2 bulls for breeding.50 breeding ewes.2 lambs per ewe per year .The sheep had been sheared and look cold.Meat sold direct to wholesale bu- tcher.Machinery owned is 1 crawler tractor,7 tractors with implements,1 combine harvester and 1 Land Rover.
